timeTableModel

Class TimeTableBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • timeTableModel.TimeTableBuilder

  • public class TimeTableBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder of timetable For now the algorithms only handle the repartition of the lessons into a time range. Also contain static functions to check the availaibility of a room.
    Version:
    06/2016
    Author:
    Flavien DELANGLE and Marie PAYET

      • findFreeRoom

        public static Room findFreeRoom(java.util.Date dateBegin,
                                java.util.Date dateEnd,
                                java.lang.String login,
                                int minCapacity,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Room> rooms,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TimeTable> timeTables)
        Try to find a Room suitable for the requested schedule and with the right capacity. It will always the smallest suitable room in term of capacity.
        Parameters:
        dateBegin - Date a which the book must begin
        dateEnd - Date a which the book must end
        login - Login of the teacher that wants to make this lesson
        minCapacity - Number of student in the booking
        rooms - All the rooms stored in the program
        timeTables - All the timetables stored in the program
        Returns:
        A room that can host the lesson

      • isBookingPossible

        public static java.lang.Boolean isBookingPossible(int timeTableId,
                                                  int bookingId,
                                                  java.lang.String teacherLogin,
                                                  java.util.Date dateBegin,
                                                  java.util.Date dateEnd,
                                                  Room room,
                                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TimeTable> timeTables)
        Check if the booking is possible (most complete version)
        Parameters:
        timeTableId - ID the of the timetable in which we want to make the book
        bookingId - ID we want to name the book with
        teacherLogin - Login of the teacher that wants to make this lesson
        dateBegin - Date a which the book must begin
        dateEnd - Date a which the book must end
        room - Room in which we want to make the lesson
        timeTables - All the TimeTables in which we must search for the books
        Returns:
        Is this book possible ?

      • isBookIdFree

        public static java.lang.Boolean isBookIdFree(TimeTable timeTable,
                                             int bookingId)
        Check if the ID of a book is free to use
        Parameters:
        timeTable - Timetable in which the book has been made
        bookingId - Actual ID of the book
        Returns:
        Is the bookId free in this timetable ?

      • isBookingPossible

        public static java.lang.Boolean isBookingPossible(java.lang.String teacherLogin,
                                                  java.util.Date dateBegin,
                                                  java.util.Date dateEnd,
                                                  Room room,
                                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TimeTable> timeTables)
        Check if the booking is possible by checking the dates of every other booking in this room Warning : This method doesn't check if the ID is already taken
        Parameters:
        teacherLogin - Login of the teacher that wants to make this lesson
        dateBegin - Date a which the book must begin
        dateEnd - Date a which the book must end
        room - Room in which we want to make the lesson
        timeTables - All the TimeTables in which we must search for the books
        Returns:
        Is this book possible ?

      • checkBookingConflict

        public static java.lang.Boolean checkBookingConflict(org.jdom2.Element rootXML,
                                                     int timeTableId,
                                                     int bookId,
                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TimeTable> timeTablesLive)
        Check if a book is still possible (to execute if the XML database has been updated since the last time it had been loaded)
        Parameters:
        rootXML - XML representation of the actual state of the database
        timeTableId - ID in which we want to check if the book is still possible
        bookId - ID of the book we want to check if it is still possible
        timeTablesLive - Map of all the timeTables actually in the program
        Returns:
        Is there a conflict for this book ?

      • resolveBookingConflict

        public static java.lang.Boolean resolveBookingConflict(TimeTable timeTable,
                                                       int bookId,
                                                       java.util.Date dateBegin,
                                                       java.util.Date dateEnd,
                                                       java.lang.String login,
                                                       Room exRoom,
                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Room> rooms,
                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,TimeTable> timeTables)
        Try to resolve a conflictual booking
        Parameters:
        timeTable - TimeTable in which we want to resolve a book conflict
        bookId - ID of the book we want to resolve
        dateBegin - Date a which the book must begin
        dateEnd - Date a which the book must end
        login - Login of the teacher that wants to make this lesson
        exRoom - Room in which this book was originally
        rooms - All the rooms stored in the program
        timeTables - All the timetables stored in the program
        Returns:
        Was there a conflict ?
